regular-title: Who Invited Howard to the Round Robin?
regular-body:
sometimeisbetterthannotime:

When my people gave up the silly dream of interstellar flight, and focused instead on what we could do with electricity and radiation, we discovered some fun shit. Some of your people are just now starting to get the picture, but by the time they’ve figured it all out, we’ll have already moved in. We might even help speed it all along.

"How does it work?"

Do you know how a computer works? I mean REALLY? Could you build one from scratch? No, you just take advantage of that technology. That’s kind of what I’m doing. I don’t really know the specifics of how you can reprogram something fleshy like a brain, but they figured it out. I wasn’t involved. On both planets, Aaron Turner is a gardener.

Read More

What is it about aliens and humans named Jack?
